title: Photo Watch (Android Wear)
summary: Your photo is your watch face - the best way to show photo on your watch!
description: Your photo is your watch face! Photo Watch is the fastest way to show photo on your Android Wear watch!NOTE: • Android Wear 2 users please download Photo Watch 2 with support of complications!• Gear S2/S3 users please download Photo Watch Pro from Galaxy AppsYou can:• Take a photo from camera• Select from best picked pictures on Internet• Select a picture from your own photo album or Google PhotosSelect one of the provided watch faces, the photo will show up as background on the watch face immediately! It is that simple!You can: • Customise the text (including emojis) -  add a special message for your love one!• Change font and color• Change time display position• Change photo brightness★ Works with all Android Wear watches (1.3 and above). ★ Upgrade to Photo Watch Pro for more features and watch faces!
descriptionHTML:
Your photo is your watch face! Photo Watch is the fastest way to show photo on your Android Wear watch!

NOTE:
• Android Wear 2 users please download Photo Watch 2 with support of complications!
• Gear S2/S3 users please download Photo Watch Pro from Galaxy Apps

You can:
• Take a photo from camera
• Select from best picked pictures on Internet
• Select a picture from your own photo album or Google Photos

Select one of the provided watch faces, the photo will show up as background on the watch face immediately! It is that simple!

You can:
• Customise the text (including emojis) - add a special message for your love one!
• Change font and color
• Change time display position
• Change photo brightness

★ Works with all Android Wear watches (1.3 and above).
★ Upgrade to Photo Watch Pro for more features and watch faces!
comments: This app was working great until the last update I did nothing, except the update, and now my watch refund out of battery before the end of my day. Before the update, I could go two days before recharging it. I have it as a three because it used to be a five and now it's a zero in my opinion. Please fix this issue.

This app is great! I really like the placement of the date and day and the quality is so good that you can see your photo well and still pick out the information that you want. The free version has everything that I want but I am going to pay to upgrade because this is so good! I love my watch again!
When i change the app this app dosnt work. I changed my ph note edge to note 4
Won't let me change to my photo selected
